jQuery.ptTimeSelect._ptTimeSelectInit = function ()
Internal method.
jQuery.ptTimeSelect.closeCntr = function(i)
Closes (hides it) the popup container.
jQuery.ptTimeSelect.openCntr = function (ele)
Displays the time definition area on the page, right below the input field.
Attaches a ptTimeSelect widget to each matched element.
jQuery.ptTimeSelect.setHr = function(h)
Sets the hour selected by the user on the popup.
jQuery.ptTimeSelect.setMin = function(m)
Sets the minutes selected by the user on the popup.
jQuery.ptTimeSelect.setTime = function()
Takes the time defined by the user and sets it to the input element that the popup is currently opened for.
